Lyric:
[00:10.02]Can we pretend that airplanes

[00:22.54]In the night sky
[00:23.72]Are like shooting stars
[00:25.57]I could really use a wish right now (wish right now) (wish right now)

[00:30.86]Yeah
[00:31.81]I could use a dream or a genie or a wish
[00:34.12]To go back to a place much simpler than this
[00:36.87]Cause after all the partyin and smashin and crashin
[00:39.73]And all the glitz and the glam and the fashion
[00:42.31]And all the pandemonium and all the madness
[00:44.81]There comes a time where you fade to the blackness
[00:47.55]And when you're staring at that phone in your lap
[00:49.59]And you hoping but them people never call you back
[00:53.05]But that's just how the story unfolds
[00:54.87]You get another hand soon after you fold
[00:57.69]And when your plans unravel
[00:59.39]And they sayin what would you wish for
[01:01.23]If you had one chance

[01:05.37]I'm on my way so don't close that gate
